sentences.en: And accoutrements of rhythmic gymnastics - the hoop, the swirling ribbon - divert from the balletic grace of the athletes.
sentences.cn: 艺术体操用的铁环和像漩涡一样的飘带在芭蕾舞一般优雅的运动员手中换来换去.

sentences.en: I loved stationery and all the accoutrements of writing.
sentences.cn: 我喜爱信笺信封和所有文房用具。

sentences.en: Mr Obama now has all the accoutrements of a president - in - waiting.
sentences.cn: 奥巴马已经为接任总统做好了准备.

sentences.en: Older structures, such as the parliament, were to be tarted up with domes and other accoutrements.
sentences.cn: 如议会大楼这样的旧建筑则被穹顶和另外建筑结构装扮起来.

sentences.en: She seemed so experienced and self - reliant in her tinsel helmet and military accoutrements.
sentences.cn: 她戴着金箔头盔,佩着士兵装备,看上去经验丰富,信心十足.

sentences.en: The above - said member has already returned all items of CAS uniform and accoutrements or compensated CASHQitems.
sentences.cn: 上述队员已按规定交还所有民安队制服及装备或照价赔偿与民安队.

sentences.en: The soldier was checking his accoutrements when he heard the gun shoot.
sentences.cn: 听到枪响时,这个士兵正在检查他的装备.

sentences.en: the stylish accoutrements of an English country gentleman
sentences.cn: 一名英国乡绅的时髦装备

trans.tran_cn: 设备，（个人的全套）衣服，（个人佩带的）饰品，常规，穿着，配备( accoutrement的名词复数 )
trans.tran_en: the equipment needed for a particular activity or way of life
